title: Instagram wants you to stop posting everything you do as a Story
content:
Instagram is a great platform for documenting our exciting lives and sharing them with the world. However, sometimes we don’t want these moments to stick on our timelines forever. That’s the purpose of an Instagram Story. There you can upload endless feeds of edited photos and videos that show your fans how exactly you got

The post Instagram wants you to stop posting everything you do as a Story appeared first on XDA.
description: Instagram is testing a new Story behavior that only shows three posts instead of displaying the countless ones a user has posted.
